recipe.notes: Another one with possible lineage from my Gramma Jackson else my Mom -- they traded quite a few back  and forth over the years.   Always best if served into a hacked-up monster loaf of sourdough.
recipe.name: Spinach Dip
recipe.preparation: Refrigerate to allow flavor to develop.  Hollow out round loaf of French bread.  Cut bread into squares and fill hollow with dip.
